events.name: ColdChainMonitoringAlert
events.description: To raise alerts when temperature deviations occur.

events.name: ColdChainMonitoringReviewed
events.description: To signify that the monitoring data has been reviewed by an analyst.

events.name: ColdChainMonitoringAcknowledged
events.description: Essential for tracking responses to alerts.

commands.name: TriggerAlert
commands.description: To raise alerts when temperature deviations occur.

commands.name: ReviewMonitoring
commands.description: To signify that the monitoring data has been reviewed by an analyst.

commands.name: AcknowledgeAlert
commands.description: Essential for tracking responses to alerts.

integrationPoints.name: NotificationService
integrationPoints.description: To send alerts and notifications about cold chain status.

integrationPoints.name: ReportingService
integrationPoints.description: To generate reports based on monitoring data.
